##The maid's plague 04: No cake, I wrote a letter to my daughter

Micro-signal kidsdoit

Function introduction, practice school (Beijing Xixi Children Care Center Vocational Training Department) , is a 15-18-year-old migrant children full-time, non-academic vocational education public welfare projects. The mission and vision are: to explore new career development paths for the children of migrant workers, and to cultivate "precious ordinary people" for a good society.

Editor = = = = = = 

Starting in 2019, the practical school for the children of migrant workers, and the Magnolia Flower for female workers, jointly organized a writing class for female workers, some of whom are domestic workers, some of whom are cooks, some of whom are salesmen.

Recently, we have some in Beijing, some in the home, more or less, have also been affected by the new pneumonia epidemic. We asked if we could write about our experiences during this time. As a result, we received quite a few articles.

We keep sending them out. You are welcome to read it, and you are welcome to give tips to the author. Your encouragement is very important. Thank you!

The Mulan Sisters'record under the outbreak

By Yan tingyu

Introduce Myself: I was born in Jilin, dropped out of school at the age of 18 to go to Beijing, met my husband in Shandong, had a couple of children one after another, have been taking care of the children at home since I got married, when I was 40, my children went to primary school, in order not to delay to pick up the children and can earn money to support the family, I chose to do insurance sales. Insurance sales are by the performance of the money, the work is not easy only know.

☟

In 2019, some things happened in our small family, some financial constraints, back home for the New Year, means that there is not a small amount of spending. My husband and I had a bit of a temper Tantrum over "do you want to go home? ". Later, in the husband and daughter's persuasion, we came back. Set (lunar first month) back to Beijing on the fifth day, the result was blocked by an epidemic.

We've been away from home for years. The home is relatively simple, return time does not arrange so long, take along a few clothes and children's a little homework. No one expected to stay so long. A few days ago, the children enjoy playing, these days the children also can not stay.

Although I have been married for many years, I have not spent much time in my hometown. To use the old saying, I'm a girl outside the gate, I'm not used to a lot of things here.

The writer's in-laws and youngest son

My father-in-law is an introverted Shandong man. With three children, four old people and a mentally ill wife. Over the years, the old people have left one after another, the children are also married, and now only in-laws in the old home. Mother-in-law is a mental patient, flash more than 40 years, life is taken care of by father-in-law, she incontinence, is a big problem in the family.

There's nothing back home. When we got married, things weren't great at home, and my husband and I got married naked. At that time for others good can spoil me, according to me. I didn't think about what I was GONNA do. I didn't ask him for anything.

Husband had a rough childhood. This time back, may be idle, he said most is: "good to have you. " He was talking about me and the children.

On the morning of the second day of the first lunar month, I saw reports of the outbreak on my friends'circle. I wasn't really paying attention. Just know the outbreak in Wuhan, thought like the Wenchuan County earthquake, is the local event did not think too much. Most of the information came from cell phones, and then the outbreak got worse.

We came home late years ago. We didn't have a lot of stuff. A few days ago to go with the town to buy some necessities, have to go to the brigade to open a certificate. Go out of the village to be heavily armed (with a hat, mask, gloves, with identity cards) . The village secretary parked a tractor at the entrance of the village. No one from outside was allowed to enter. The road was sparsely populated.

Can Not go out of the village, can not gather, can not string relatives, can not return to Beijing, the village megaphone every day in the propaganda epidemic matters needing attention. Take your temperature, check your ID and leave your phone number before you go shopping. When you get back, go back to the battalion and make notes. It's tight. I feel a little awkward coming back here.

So many days in the past, calm down and think about it, not to the country is the greatest support for the country. Start with me, start with my family, start with a routine.

I started from (Lunar First Month) the sixth day, 8:30 am to start online meetings, training, self-study, prepare to resume work after the certified financial planner. Rest time with her daughter playing basketball, playing badminton, rope skipping, do aerobics, play Gobang, playing poker.

Children recite ancient poetry, practice writing, every day 20 mouth math problems. Little girl independent learning, GRANDPA like to play poker, but usually no one to play with him, just little girl just learned, with the two play together Lai, ha ha ha.

My husband decorates the house and takes care of the family. Most of the emotion is too busy to work, so have time to accompany them.

Epidemic let us know that life does not seek wealth, but peace. May We all ride out this outbreak, and salute all of our front-line staff who are fighting it! All the people fought against the Japanese invaders, and all the medical personnel returned safely. Together, we actively cooperated with the work of the country.

February 19, daughter's birthday, the impact of the epidemic, can not buy her a birthday cake. So, I wrote her a letter, sent it to her a little after 3:00 in the morning, and she woke up in shock.
Letter to daughter:

In 2004, my father and I married, my father and I are not high education, no social background, no good family environment, in the circumstances of nothing, I married my father. After my father's love, I know I married a man who can rely on life. In May of that year, I found out that I was pregnant. My father and I were beautiful. Although we do not earn much, life is simple, but with you we are very happy, very excited.

In the winter of 2005, when Beijing was dry, the weather around the Spring Festival was always foggy. The due date is coming up. MEEMAW came to our house to take care of my baby. Grandma's here. I feel so much better. Grandma complained about the bad weather in Beijing, no snow, no rain, do not know what the situation.

With your mother, Fat, stupid, and walking around like a penguin. I was pregnant for the first time, although the conditions are not very good, but as long as I want to eat anything, midnight, my father went to buy me, prompted me light up the flesh. What do we imagine you to be like every day, a boy or a girl? Both hopeful and terrified.

The doctor said the due date was February 16th. Dad and grandma had been watching my stomach several days in advance, looking forward to your arrival. During the period of your pregnancy to go to the hospital regular physical examination, each time the doctor said very good, I feel very comfortable. I didn't feel it when I was pregnant with you, and it was like nine months of being Queen.

This year we spent in Beijing. My father also found a good car in advance, waiting for me to go to the hospital when the birth. It was February 18th, and after dinner, I felt a pain in my stomach, a pain in my stomach, but then it passed. So for a while the pain for a while do not know what the situation, Grandma said to prepare to go to the hospital. Well, if nothing else, I'm a little nervous about it.

Grandma quickly prepared emergency supplies to the hospital, to the hospital doctor said amniotic fluid less, stay. Then he gave me an injection to induce labor, and the pain that I felt after the injection came, the sharp, falling pain, like a knife in my stomach. Meemaw said it was quicker to walk around, and Dad walked me down the hall. More than 5:00 into the hospital for admission procedures, until 10:00 at night, I kept walking, really do not have the strength to rest for a while, just sat down with severe abdominal pain, so for a while to walk, a while to rest.

The pain gets worse around 10:00 p.m. , the unbearable kind, and the doctor says, "let's go. Let's go to the delivery room. ". I thought the pain would end when I went into the delivery room, and, Oh, my God, there were two birthing beds in one room, and the room was so cold, and there was only one doctor. Dad and grandma is not in my side, cold and afraid of me, just roll away in bed, the pain is severe on the call out, it should be said that it is a kind of hysterical call. The nurse comes over to say a mouth: "What shout, who gives birth to a child does not ache? ! " Looking at her not old appearance not to have given birth to a child.

In the hospital did not dare to say, and could not help but feel sleepy and tired I do not know how good, at that time is really dead have the heart. I said to the nurse stupidly: "Can I stop giving birth? " The nurse ignored me. A short while the doctor came, I asked weakly: "Can I c-section? " The doctor very stiffly came: "can give birth by oneself, what c-section? "

So stand, endure, pain, in the delivery room can not wear clothes, so naked without a bit of dignity. I don't know when you were born and started hating you, which is why I'm in this mess.

As the minutes ticked by, the day dawned and the pain worsened. I do not know is a nurse shot again, or you are about to be born, heart-wrenching pain, with the doctor squeeze rub pain. "Push, push, push. " The doctor in the side of the non-stop urging, I have reached the limit, it is no energy.

When you were born, I seem to have passed out, heard you "wow wow" cry, what do not remember. I don't know how long it took, but I came around, and the doctor said it was okay, so go back to your room. I also asked, "where's my baby? " The nurse said she had been picked up by the family. I'm so angry, don't care about me?

After a while, I was pushed out of the delivery room, and saw my father laughing and saying, "wife, you work hard! " I cried out, "WOW! " I replied, "Tian Baojie, I fucking hate you! " My father hugged me and pushed me back into the ward, hold you over to me and say: "You see, little girl. " Oh, you are so ugly, and dirty, put me next to you, I did not care you, fell asleep. Wake up in the afternoon, the nurse gave you a bath. I see, Hee Hee: White and clean a little girl, really good-looking. Dad asked me what I wanted to eat, said it had been snowing all day, and I said, "Cher. " . You'll have a baby name. By the way, I was discharged from the hospital after three days and went home.

I'M A FIRST-TIME MOM, and I'm GONNA have a baby for a month. MEEMAW will take care of you for a few days. I can't even touch you when I look at you every day. Grandma stayed in Beijing for 12 days before she went back to her hometown. I could only learn from her and try to take care of you. Dad To go to work, I take you at home, Grandma told me when she left, Yuezi fall ill, to my own more attention, I did not take it seriously, later, my back often ache.

The days go by so fast. Fifteen years ago, you, which dare to imagine such a flash of big, slim and tall girl, with the general mother, than her mother is smart. But when you were born, my mother still remembered, a lifetime of memories, good to have you, with you, I have a home with my father, with my brother, we have a complete family.

Editor: Yeung yik-kum
PLATE MAKING: Lin Chuhong

Editor = = = = = = 

Starting in 2019, the practical school for the children of migrant workers, and the Magnolia Flower for female workers, jointly organized a writing class for female workers, some of whom are domestic workers, some of whom are cooks, some of whom are salesmen.

Recently, we have some in Beijing, some in the home, more or less, have also been affected by the new pneumonia epidemic. We asked if we could write about our experiences during this time. As a result, we received quite a few articles.

We keep sending them out. You are welcome to read it, and you are welcome to give tips to the author. Your encouragement is very important. Thank you!

The Mulan Sisters'record under the outbreak

By Yan tingyu

Introduce Myself: I was born in Jilin, dropped out of school at the age of 18 to go to Beijing, met my husband in Shandong, had a couple of children one after another, have been taking care of the children at home since I got married, when I was 40, my children went to primary school, in order not to delay to pick up the children and can earn money to support the family, I chose to do insurance sales. Insurance sales are by the performance of the money, the work is not easy only know.

☟

In 2019, some things happened in our small family, some financial constraints, back home for the New Year, means that there is not a small amount of spending. My husband and I had a bit of a temper Tantrum over "do you want to go home? ". Later, in the husband and daughter's persuasion, we came back. Set (lunar first month) back to Beijing on the fifth day, the result was blocked by an epidemic.

We've been away from home for years. The home is relatively simple, return time does not arrange so long, take along a few clothes and children's a little homework. No one expected to stay so long. A few days ago, the children enjoy playing, these days the children also can not stay.

Although I have been married for many years, I have not spent much time in my hometown. To use the old saying, I'm a girl outside the gate, I'm not used to a lot of things here.

![img](data:image/jpeg;base64,)
The writer's in-laws and youngest son

My father-in-law is an introverted Shandong man. With three children, four old people and a mentally ill wife. Over the years, the old people have left one after another, the children are also married, and now only in-laws in the old home. Mother-in-law is a mental patient, flash more than 40 years, life is taken care of by father-in-law, she incontinence, is a big problem in the family.

There's nothing back home. When we got married, things weren't great at home, and my husband and I got married naked. At that time for others good can spoil me, according to me. I didn't think about what I was GONNA do. I didn't ask him for anything.

Husband had a rough childhood. This time back, may be idle, he said most is: "good to have you. " He was talking about me and the children.

On the morning of the second day of the first lunar month, I saw reports of the outbreak on my friends'circle. I wasn't really paying attention. Just know the outbreak in Wuhan, thought like the Wenchuan County earthquake, is the local event did not think too much. Most of the information came from cell phones, and then the outbreak got worse.

We came home late years ago. We didn't have a lot of stuff. A few days ago to go with the town to buy some necessities, have to go to the brigade to open a certificate. Go out of the village to be heavily armed (with a hat, mask, gloves, with identity cards) . The village secretary parked a tractor at the entrance of the village. No one from outside was allowed to enter. The road was sparsely populated.

Can Not go out of the village, can not gather, can not string relatives, can not return to Beijing, the village megaphone every day in the propaganda epidemic matters needing attention. Take your temperature, check your ID and leave your phone number before you go shopping. When you get back, go back to the battalion and make notes. It's tight. I feel a little awkward coming back here.

So many days in the past, calm down and think about it, not to the country is the greatest support for the country. Start with me, start with my family, start with a routine.

I started from (Lunar First Month) the sixth day, 8:30 am to start online meetings, training, self-study, prepare to resume work after the certified financial planner. Rest time with her daughter playing basketball, playing badminton, rope skipping, do aerobics, play Gobang, playing poker.

Children recite ancient poetry, practice writing, every day 20 mouth math problems. Little girl independent learning, GRANDPA like to play poker, but usually no one to play with him, just little girl just learned, with the two play together Lai, ha ha ha.

My husband decorates the house and takes care of the family. Most of the emotion is too busy to work, so have time to accompany them.

Epidemic let us know that life does not seek wealth, but peace. May We all ride out this outbreak, and salute all of our front-line staff who are fighting it! All the people fought against the Japanese invaders, and all the medical personnel returned safely. Together, we actively cooperated with the work of the country.

February 19, daughter's birthday, the impact of the epidemic, can not buy her a birthday cake. So, I wrote her a letter, sent it to her a little after 3:00 in the morning, and she woke up in shock.

Letter to daughter:

In 2004, my father and I married, my father and I are not high education, no social background, no good family environment, in the circumstances of nothing, I married my father. After my father's love, I know I married a man who can rely on life. In May of that year, I found out that I was pregnant. My father and I were beautiful. Although we do not earn much, life is simple, but with you we are very happy, very excited.

In the winter of 2005, when Beijing was dry, the weather around the Spring Festival was always foggy. The due date is coming up. MEEMAW came to our house to take care of my baby. Grandma's here. I feel so much better. Grandma complained about the bad weather in Beijing, no snow, no rain, do not know what the situation.

With your mother, Fat, stupid, and walking around like a penguin. I was pregnant for the first time, although the conditions are not very good, but as long as I want to eat anything, midnight, my father went to buy me, prompted me light up the flesh. What do we imagine you to be like every day, a boy or a girl? Both hopeful and terrified.

The doctor said the due date was February 16th. Dad and grandma had been watching my stomach several days in advance, looking forward to your arrival. During the period of your pregnancy to go to the hospital regular physical examination, each time the doctor said very good, I feel very comfortable. I didn't feel it when I was pregnant with you, and it was like nine months of being Queen.

This year we spent in Beijing. My father also found a good car in advance, waiting for me to go to the hospital when the birth. It was February 18th, and after dinner, I felt a pain in my stomach, a pain in my stomach, but then it passed. So for a while the pain for a while do not know what the situation, Grandma said to prepare to go to the hospital. Well, if nothing else, I'm a little nervous about it.

Grandma quickly prepared emergency supplies to the hospital, to the hospital doctor said amniotic fluid less, stay. Then he gave me an injection to induce labor, and the pain that I felt after the injection came, the sharp, falling pain, like a knife in my stomach. Meemaw said it was quicker to walk around, and Dad walked me down the hall. More than 5:00 into the hospital for admission procedures, until 10:00 at night, I kept walking, really do not have the strength to rest for a while, just sat down with severe abdominal pain, so for a while to walk, a while to rest.

The pain gets worse around 10:00 p.m. , the unbearable kind, and the doctor says, "let's go. Let's go to the delivery room. ". I thought the pain would end when I went into the delivery room, and, Oh, my God, there were two birthing beds in one room, and the room was so cold, and there was only one doctor. Dad and grandma is not in my side, cold and afraid of me, just roll away in bed, the pain is severe on the call out, it should be said that it is a kind of hysterical call. The nurse comes over to say a mouth: "What shout, who gives birth to a child does not ache? ! " Looking at her not old appearance not to have given birth to a child.

In the hospital did not dare to say, and could not help but feel sleepy and tired I do not know how good, at that time is really dead have the heart. I said to the nurse stupidly: "Can I stop giving birth? " The nurse ignored me. A short while the doctor came, I asked weakly: "Can I c-section? " The doctor very stiffly came: "can give birth by oneself, what c-section? "

So stand, endure, pain, in the delivery room can not wear clothes, so naked without a bit of dignity. I don't know when you were born and started hating you, which is why I'm in this mess.

As the minutes ticked by, the day dawned and the pain worsened. I do not know is a nurse shot again, or you are about to be born, heart-wrenching pain, with the doctor squeeze rub pain. "Push, push, push. " The doctor in the side of the non-stop urging, I have reached the limit, it is no energy.

When you were born, I seem to have passed out, heard you "wow wow" cry, what do not remember. I don't know how long it took, but I came around, and the doctor said it was okay, so go back to your room. I also asked, "where's my baby? " The nurse said she had been picked up by the family. I'm so angry, don't care about me?

After a while, I was pushed out of the delivery room, and saw my father laughing and saying, "wife, you work hard! " I cried out, "WOW! " I replied, "Tian Baojie, I fucking hate you! " My father hugged me and pushed me back into the ward, hold you over to me and say: "You see, little girl. " Oh, you are so ugly, and dirty, put me next to you, I did not care you, fell asleep. Wake up in the afternoon, the nurse gave you a bath. I see, Hee Hee: White and clean a little girl, really good-looking. Dad asked me what I wanted to eat, said it had been snowing all day, and I said, "Cher. " . You'll have a baby name. By the way, I was discharged from the hospital after three days and went home.

I'M A FIRST-TIME MOM, and I'm GONNA have a baby for a month. MEEMAW will take care of you for a few days. I can't even touch you when I look at you every day. Grandma stayed in Beijing for 12 days before she went back to her hometown. I could only learn from her and try to take care of you. Dad To go to work, I take you at home, Grandma told me when she left, Yuezi fall ill, to my own more attention, I did not take it seriously, later, my back often ache.

The days go by so fast. Fifteen years ago, you, which dare to imagine such a flash of big, slim and tall girl, with the general mother, than her mother is smart. But when you were born, my mother still remembered, a lifetime of memories, good to have you, with you, I have a home with my father, with my brother, we have a complete family.

Letter to daughter:

In 2004, my father and I married, my father and I are not high education, no social background, no good family environment, in the circumstances of nothing, I married my father. After my father's love, I know I married a man who can rely on life. In May of that year, I found out that I was pregnant. My father and I were beautiful. Although we do not earn much, life is simple, but with you we are very happy, very excited.

In the winter of 2005, when Beijing was dry, the weather around the Spring Festival was always foggy. The due date is coming up. MEEMAW came to our house to take care of my baby. Grandma's here. I feel so much better. Grandma complained about the bad weather in Beijing, no snow, no rain, do not know what the situation.

With your mother, Fat, stupid, and walking around like a penguin. I was pregnant for the first time, although the conditions are not very good, but as long as I want to eat anything, midnight, my father went to buy me, prompted me light up the flesh. What do we imagine you to be like every day, a boy or a girl? Both hopeful and terrified.

The doctor said the due date was February 16th. Dad and grandma had been watching my stomach several days in advance, looking forward to your arrival. During the period of your pregnancy to go to the hospital regular physical examination, each time the doctor said very good, I feel very comfortable. I didn't feel it when I was pregnant with you, and it was like nine months of being Queen.

This year we spent in Beijing. My father also found a good car in advance, waiting for me to go to the hospital when the birth. It was February 18th, and after dinner, I felt a pain in my stomach, a pain in my stomach, but then it passed. So for a while the pain for a while do not know what the situation, Grandma said to prepare to go to the hospital. Well, if nothing else, I'm a little nervous about it.

Grandma quickly prepared emergency supplies to the hospital, to the hospital doctor said amniotic fluid less, stay. Then he gave me an injection to induce labor, and the pain that I felt after the injection came, the sharp, falling pain, like a knife in my stomach. Meemaw said it was quicker to walk around, and Dad walked me down the hall. More than 5:00 into the hospital for admission procedures, until 10:00 at night, I kept walking, really do not have the strength to rest for a while, just sat down with severe abdominal pain, so for a while to walk, a while to rest.

The pain gets worse around 10:00 p.m. , the unbearable kind, and the doctor says, "let's go. Let's go to the delivery room. ". I thought the pain would end when I went into the delivery room, and, Oh, my God, there were two birthing beds in one room, and the room was so cold, and there was only one doctor. Dad and grandma is not in my side, cold and afraid of me, just roll away in bed, the pain is severe on the call out, it should be said that it is a kind of hysterical call. The nurse comes over to say a mouth: "What shout, who gives birth to a child does not ache? ! " Looking at her not old appearance not to have given birth to a child.

In the hospital did not dare to say, and could not help but feel sleepy and tired I do not know how good, at that time is really dead have the heart. I said to the nurse stupidly: "Can I stop giving birth? " The nurse ignored me. A short while the doctor came, I asked weakly: "Can I c-section? " The doctor very stiffly came: "can give birth by oneself, what c-section? "

So stand, endure, pain, in the delivery room can not wear clothes, so naked without a bit of dignity. I don't know when you were born and started hating you, which is why I'm in this mess.

As the minutes ticked by, the day dawned and the pain worsened. I do not know is a nurse shot again, or you are about to be born, heart-wrenching pain, with the doctor squeeze rub pain. "Push, push, push. " The doctor in the side of the non-stop urging, I have reached the limit, it is no energy.

When you were born, I seem to have passed out, heard you "wow wow" cry, what do not remember. I don't know how long it took, but I came around, and the doctor said it was okay, so go back to your room. I also asked, "where's my baby? " The nurse said she had been picked up by the family. I'm so angry, don't care about me?

After a while, I was pushed out of the delivery room, and saw my father laughing and saying, "wife, you work hard! " I cried out, "WOW! " I replied, "Tian Baojie, I fucking hate you! " My father hugged me and pushed me back into the ward, hold you over to me and say: "You see, little girl. " Oh, you are so ugly, and dirty, put me next to you, I did not care you, fell asleep. Wake up in the afternoon, the nurse gave you a bath. I see, Hee Hee: White and clean a little girl, really good-looking. Dad asked me what I wanted to eat, said it had been snowing all day, and I said, "Cher. " . You'll have a baby name. By the way, I was discharged from the hospital after three days and went home.

I'M A FIRST-TIME MOM, and I'm GONNA have a baby for a month. MEEMAW will take care of you for a few days. I can't even touch you when I look at you every day. Grandma stayed in Beijing for 12 days before she went back to her hometown. I could only learn from her and try to take care of you. Dad To go to work, I take you at home, Grandma told me when she left, Yuezi fall ill, to my own more attention, I did not take it seriously, later, my back often ache.

The days go by so fast. Fifteen years ago, you, which dare to imagine such a flash of big, slim and tall girl, with the general mother, than her mother is smart. But when you were born, my mother still remembered, a lifetime of memories, good to have you, with you, I have a home with my father, with my brother, we have a complete family.

Editor: Yeung yik-kum
PLATE MAKING: Lin Chuhong

Editor: Yeung yik-kum

PLATE MAKING: Lin Chuhong

"Story Writing Workshop for Working Women" other works:

01: I say Beijing Medical Treatment is better than home, and my niece says it's not our turn

02: On the first day of the Lunar New Year, my daughter had a fever

03: trapped in his sister's house, unable to return to Beijing, son took his temperature out of the shadow

Founded in March 2018 in Beijing, Changping District,
It's an online marketplace for migrant children
Full-time, non-academic Vocational Education Public Welfare projects.
The mission and vision are:
Exploring new paths for the career development of the children of migrant workers,
Cultivate "precious common people" for a good society.
Admission of children of migrant workers aged 17 and above
Registration: OUZHOU1283(Ouyang)
For donation support, click on "read the original" at the bottom

Founded in March 2018 in Beijing, Changping District,

It's an online marketplace for migrant children

Full-time, non-academic Vocational Education Public Welfare projects.

The mission and vision are:

Exploring new paths for the career development of the children of migrant workers,

Cultivate "precious common people" for a good society.
